page.title: 17FRIENDS OF ELMBRIDGE
page.content: Elmbridge has a group of women who meet several times a year in order to organise functions to raise funds for the church, community projects and local charities. Coffee mornings are held in members homes when arrangements are made to clean the church or to help a needy neighbour. All newcomers to the village are welcomed with a gift and an invitation to join in the local events. Newborn babies, the sick or the elderly are also visited and presented with a gift. The village hall is maintained and run by the Friends of Elmbridge and is used for most social functions. These have great support from the community, and help to keep it together. Any money made at these gatherings is used for the most needy charity of the moment.
